experience.name: Aimo
experience.summary: At Aimo, I develop backend microservices and UI components for critical real-time logistics, tracking, and delivery platforms. My work focuses on automating the entire operational workflow, from order capture to the final delivery stage, ensuring a scalable and efficient architecture.

experience.name: Gigstack
experience.summary: I designed and implemented business logic to automate complex financial and administrative processes, facilitating direct integration with the SAT (Mexican Tax Authority). The project focused on reducing manual operational overhead through cloud-based solutions.

experience.name: Destacame
experience.summary: I developed various end-to-end solutions for the Fintech sector, leading banking integrations with entities like Santander and deploying high-availability serverless infrastructures on AWS.

experience.name: Forma - Moov Media Group
experience.summary: I was responsible for maintaining and building web interfaces for major clients like Bupa Clinics, improving business logic and visual consistency across their platforms.

experience.name: Minsky
experience.summary: I developed technological solutions for the agricultural sector (AgroTech), optimizing the flow and visualization of complex data through modern frontend and backend technologies.
